title: Create a local Dolt table for memory_blocks
goal: Enable git-style storage of memory data using Dolt.
action_items: [ ] Initialize a new Dolt database in the experiment directory (e.g., `dolt init`).
[ ] Define the `memory_blocks` table schema using Dolt SQL, based on `project.schemas.dolt_sql`.
[ ] Verify the columns (id, type, text, tags_json, metadata_json, confidence_json, source_file, source_uri, created_by, created_at, updated_at) and types match the schema.
[ ] Commit the table schema to Dolt (`dolt add .`, `dolt commit -m 'Create memory_blocks table'`).
test_criteria: Manually insert a sample MemoryBlock (without links) via Dolt SQL (`dolt sql -q 'INSERT INTO ...'`).
Verify the table structure (`dolt schema show memory_blocks`).
Verify the insertion using `dolt diff` (should show the new row).
